title: Designing Engagement Strategies for Quiet Learners in Veterinary Education

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Teaching competency enhancement program for pre-service/in-service teachers. Requires developing strategies to engage passive students in classrooms, where peer evaluation and fear of mistakes are identified as key barriers

learning_goals: Learners can proactively present opinions three or more times in small group discussions.
Learners can use polling tools to indicate real-time comprehension of 80% or more of lecture topics.
Learners can practice writing and submitting individual responses within 5 minutes without peer feedback, performing this exercise 10 or more times.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
